txt.en: A vicious group of wild hill-beasts have descended upon the path to the mine of Glimmerdeep, in Ered Mithrinâ€¦.\n\nYour mission is to defeat the hill-beasts who have descended upon the path to Glimmerdeep.
You have been tasked with defeating the hill-beasts who have descended upon the path to Glimmerdeep.
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Ausma for your reward!

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].\n\n'My scouts have come back from Glimmerdeep. There is no way into the mine! It is blocked by a roaming pack of hill-beasts who have descended into the valley from the mountains. This can not stand! We must return to Glimmerdeep and expel these beasts!'
Complete Mission: Beasts From the Hills
Some monsters in this mission will attempt a crushing attack, wounding and stunning anyone hit.
Your mission is to defeat the hill-beasts who have descended upon the path to Glimmerdeep.\n\nSpeak to Ausma to travel to Glimmerdeep.
'Well done! With the hill-beasts defeated, we can now reenter the mine! Glimmerdeep is an old mine but still a valuable resource to our war efforts!'
